question: JavaScript is the programming language of the _____.
Which type of JavaScript language is _____?
Which of the following statement(s) is true about the JavaScript?
options: It is a scripting language used to make the website interactive
It is an advanced version of Java for Desktop and Mobile application development
It is a markup language of Java to develop the webpages
answer: It is a scripting language used to make the website interactive

question: In which HTML element, we put the JavaScript code?
JavaScript code can be written in ___.
options: JavaScript file and in HTML document directly
answer: JavaScript file and in HTML document directly

question: Which symbol is used separate JavaScript statements?
JavaScript ignores?
Which is the correct syntax to call an external JavaScript file in the current HTML document?
Which JavaScript method is used to access an HTML element by id?
Which property is used to define the HTML content to an HTML element with a specific id?
Which JavaScript method is used to write HTML output?
Which JavaScript method is used to write on browser's console?
Which JavaScript method is used to write into an alert box?
Which is the correct JavaScript statement to display "Hello Boss!" into an alert box?
Which is the correct JavaScript statement to print the addition of two numbers 10 and 20 in a paragraph whose id is 'result'?

What is the use of this JavaScript statement?

<button onclick="window.print()">Submit</button>
options: It will write "Submit" on the current Window
It will print the content of the current page
It will write the content of the current page in the browser’s console
answer: It will print the content of the current page
